name: Light Cube
description:
Light Cube - At first glance, a simple platformer, but after a couple of levels it turns out that there are heavy rooms, and even total darkness, the task is not simple..
You will have a whole test, more than 10 levels, where your goal is to get to the exit leading in the next room.
Whether this test is easy, or will make you sweat, depends only on your skills!
